content: आदृत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Honoured, respected. {@--2@} (Used actively) ({%a%}) Zealous, diligent, earnest; आदृततरमवोचत् <ls>K. 211</ls>, <ls n="K.">170</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 30.</ls> ({%b%}) Attentive, careful; दंडनीत्यां नात्यादृतोऽभूत् <ls>Dk. 154.</ls> ({%c%}) Respectful (सादर); इत्यादृतेन कथितौ <ls>R. 13. 72</ls>; इति स्म पृच्छत्यनुवेलमादृतः <ls n="R.">3. 5</ls> respectfully or earnestly; <ls>Ms. 11. 226</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 150.</ls>
